title: Why a sideways stock market could indicate the highs are yet to come
text:
Bears contend the stock market’s largely sideways action over the last year signals a top may already be in. But that would be out of keeping with recent history, says one economist. See full story.

Wall Street is underestimating how much Apple will make off 5G, says Jefferies

Where is the love? Apple is under-appreciated says our call of the day. See full story.

Decision to suspend Parliament ruled unlawful — live market reaction

Here’s what analysts are saying as the U.K. Supreme Court ruled prorogation was unlawful See full story.

The strike against GM will likely fail

Auto workers don’t have the leverage they once had. See full story.

The No. 1 thing people with fat savings accounts scrimp on that you likely don’t

New research shows that more than four in 10 people who are saving a ton for retirement are slashing this essential expense. See full story.

‘It was still a tight spot, but it would be cheaper to stay at home.’ See full story.
